attributes.action: David Cameron to stand down as prime minister of uk.
attributes.background:
David Cameron has lied to the British public again and again since he came into power in may 2015.
We want him to step down as prime minister of great Britain.
And for a new leader to be elected by the British public not his pers.

rejection.details: The decision of an individual Minister to stand down is one for that individual to take, not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
